ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<4> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <5> Battery Charger for LP-E8 + <6> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> Precision Design 67mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <10> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens with EF 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Backpack + 3 UV/CPL/ND8 Filters Kit
